item.title: French Anger Over Pension Law Tops Worldwide Protests in 2023
item.description: French Anger Over Pension Law Tops Worldwide Protests in 2023 French President Emmanuel Macron’s proposed pension reform law has sparked widespread protests across the country. The law would raise the retirement age from 62 to 64 and make it harder for workers to retire early.
